body: Hope it comes in English soon.
I would love to have this cat!

@AkitoH

The protagonist's female friend, seeing protagonists "end up with" the cat-fox girl, had an emotional/sexual desire opening and got "night assaulted" by the male fox. Ending up liking the sex and decided to date the male fox. If you consider anyone the protagonists had sex with as his partner (a harem), this could be counted as a case of NTR.
It is a really sweet story.
Why is this listed as NTR? It looks like a good read if it were translated. Or am I missing something here?
